ability.name: Codex Discipline
ability.description: If your Army Faction is ADEPTUS ASTARTES, and every unit from your army is ULTRAMARINES (excluding AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM and UNALIGNED units), at the start of your Command phase, if you have Battle-shock tokens on any of your ULTRAMARINES units, you can remove one of those Battle-shock tokens.

abilities.name: Oath of Moment
abilities.description: Select one enemy unit at the start of your Command phase. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets that unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Shock Assault
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit targets an enemy unit with a melee attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If that enemy unit is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Terminator Squad.

abilities.name: Rites of Battle
abilities.description: Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: The Imperium's Sword
abilities.description: You can re-roll Charge rolls made for this model's unit.

choices.name: Bolt Pistol, Master-crafted Bolt Rifle & CCW
Neo-volkite Pistol, Power Weapon & Storm Shield

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Intercessor Squad, Assault Intercessor Squad, Infernus Squad, Heavy Intercessor Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad, or Hellblaster Squad.

abilities.name: Tactical Precision
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [Lethal Hits] ability.

abilities.name: Bladeguard
abilities.description: At the start of the Fight phase, select one of the following abilities to take effect until the end of the phase: Swords of the Chapter - Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. Shields of the Imperium - Each time an invulnerable saving throw is made for a model in this unit, re-roll a saving throw of 1.

rules.name: Combat Doctrines
rules.description: At the start of your Command phase, you can select one of the Combat Doctrines listed below. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active for your army, and its effects apply to all ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army. You can only select each Combat Doctrine once per battle.

doctrines.name: Devastator Doctrine
doctrines.description: Your units are eligible to shoot in a turn in which they Advanced.

doctrines.name: Tactical Doctrine
doctrines.description: Your units are eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which they Fell Back.

doctrines.name: Assault Doctrine
doctrines.description: Your units are eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which they Advanced.

stratagems.name: Only In Death Does Duty End
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem in the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets. Select one ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as a target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: Armour of Contempt
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem in your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets. Select one ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as a target of one or more of that enemy unit's attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

stratagems.name: Honour the Chapter
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem in the Fight phase. Select one ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. While the Assault Doctrine is active for your army, those melee weapons also have their Armour Penetration characteristic improved by 1.

stratagems.name: Storm of Fire
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem in your Shooting phase. Select one ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase. Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. While the Devastator Doctrine is active for your army, those ranged weapons also have their Armour Penetration characteristic improved by 1.

stratagems.name: Adaptive Strategy
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem at the start of any phase. Select one ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army and select one Combat Doctrine. Until the end of the phase, that Combat Doctrine is considered to be active for that unit instead of any other Combat Doctrine that is currently active for your army, even if you have already selected that Combat Doctrine to be active for your army this battle.

stratagems.name: Squad Tactics
stratagems.description: Use this Stratagem in your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move. Select one ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".

enhancements.name: Artificer Armour
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. The bearer has a Save characteristic of 2+ and the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

enhancements.name: The Honour Vehement
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. Add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of the bearer's melee weapons. While the Assault Doctrine is active for your army, add 2 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of the bearer's melee weapons instead.

enhancements.name: Adept of the Codex
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. At the start of your Command phase, if the bearer is on the battlefield, instead of selecting a Combat Doctrine to be active for your army, you can select the Tactical Doctrine. If you do, until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active for the bearer's unit only, even if you have already selected that Combat Doctrine to be active for your army this battle.

enhancements.name: Fire Discipline
enhancements.description: ADEPTUS ASTARTES model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

oath_of_moment.name: Oath of Moment
oath_of_moment.description: At the start of your Command phase, select one enemy unit to be the target of your Oath of Moment. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model from your army with this ability makes an attack that targets that unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

weaponKeywords.Devastating Wounds: Critical wounds (unmodified wound roll of 6) inflict mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic, and the attack sequence ends.
weaponKeywords.Lethal Hits: Critical hits (unmodified hit roll of 6) automatically wound the target.
weaponKeywords.Sustained Hits: Critical hits generate additional hits (number specified after the ability name).
weaponKeywords.Assault: Can shoot after Advancing (at -1 to hit).
weaponKeywords.Pistol: Can shoot in Engagement Range, but only at units within Engagement Range.
weaponKeywords.Blast: +1 attack per 5 models in target unit (minimum 3 attacks vs 6+ models).
weaponKeywords.Rapid Fire: Double the Attacks characteristic when targeting within half range.
weaponKeywords.Heavy: +1 to hit if the bearer's unit Remained Stationary this turn.
weaponKeywords.Anti-: Improves wound roll against targets with the specified keyword (e.g., Anti-Vehicle 4+ wounds on 4+ vs Vehicles).
weaponKeywords.Hazardous: After resolving attacks, roll one D6. On a 1, bearer suffers 3 mortal wounds.
weaponKeywords.Precision: When targeting a unit with an attached Leader, attacks with this ability can target the Character instead of the unit.
weaponKeywords.Extra Attacks: These attacks are made in addition to the bearer's normal attacks, using the weapon's profile.
weaponKeywords.Ignores Cover: The target does not receive the benefit of cover against attacks with this ability.
weaponKeywords.Melta: When targeting within half range, add D6 damage (or D3 for Melta 2, etc.).
weaponKeywords.Lance: +1 to wound on the turn the bearer charged.
